src:
Ground Control To Major Dimitri
04 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Luke Plunkett



Lars Sowig is an artist at DICE who has previously worked on games like The Division 2 and Warface.
You can see more of Lars’ stuff at his ArtStation page.
